title: LTU_btc
author: LTU_btc
created_time: June 10, 2023, 06:23:25 PMLast edit: June 10, 2023, 06:56:14 PM by LTU_btc
content: In recent days something happened to my Chrome browser on Android - text size on reply field become such small that I have zoom in to be able to read. Few days ago everything was fine and text size was normal. Did anyone faced similar issue and how to fix it?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Isn't this normal for smartphone users? The zooming in and out just to read using mobile browsers although there is always browser settings for the font size to change dynamically.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on June 10, 2023, 06:23:25 PMIn recent days something happened to my Chrome browser on Android - text size on reply field become such small that I have zoom in to be able to read. Few days ago everything was fine and text size was normal. Did anyone faced similar issue and how to fix it?Although, I don't use the website on an Android based device, but I also have to zoom in to read the posts on my PC because of the small text. I think this thing might be related to our display's resolution and is not an issue from website. I'm also using Chrome browser but the PC version. I have to zoom the site up-to 200% to write replies. But, on PC it's still manageable and doesn't require much effort to zoom up-to 200% or more in order to write a reply. I think you should try to increase text and font size on your Android device and that might solve the problem for you. Because when I was using Android based smartphone I used to do that thing and most of the times it would work on applications and web browsers. You may also check if your browser has built-in text settings and change the text-size in those settings as well so you might be able to read the reply without any issue.

comments.body: I had the same case a long time ago the text size was changed I tried to change any font settings on the Chrome browser but the result is the same.I also changed my phone settings about fonts but only phone UI fonts were changed.It seems that we can't change the font size while editing a post maybe forum fonts are fixed?Edit:It seems the Zoom works to me under 3 dots it changes text size but it is still pretty small it is likely the same as Zoom through your two fingers.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: I experienced this long ago but it changed now and maybe it's because of the browser that when you view something it depends on your device but if you still experience the same problem then why not try to change the text size on the settings?. Text size settings is available on chrome and all you have to do is go to settings and tap on accessibility then you will see the text size scale but you still have to zoom the page a little bit but I think it's fine. If not found in settings then accessibility then try updating the app then go to settings and accessibility again.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: The SMF we are using in the forum is not designed for responsive for mobile applications, even if you use different browsers the output is still the same, for the smaller screens the textbox will resize fit on the screen but not as accurately as it is, your only option is to pinch to zoom in the text box. Many users propose too having a mobile application like Insanerman's Layout
